resources.string: In order to keep you secure we don\'t know anything about you. And it must continue that way!
We will give you an ID in order to access your account. You must store it and don\'t share with anyone!
If you lose your account ID or forget the password we will not be able to assist you! If were able to do so, then we would have access to your account.
In case you forgot your password don\'t attempt to brute force, after 3 attempts your data will be deleted.
Account ID or password are incorrect
